notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: C.H.-G., M.R.-G., I.L.-O., M.-Á.S.-F., R.C.-O. and D.T.-L. conceived, designed and performed the experiments. C.H.-G., M.R.-G., M.-Á.S.-F., R.C.-O. and D.T.-L. analyzed the data. D.T.-L. supervised work. C.H.-G., M.R.-G., I.L.-O., M.-Á.S.-F. and D.T.-L. wrote the manuscript with input from all authors.
